DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Controlled Trial Evaluate Effectiveness Electromyography ( EMG ) -Biofeedback Patients With Fibromyalgia
DOC.detailed_description: The objective randomized control trial evaluate effectiveness EMG-biofeedback patient Fibromyalgia . The assessor blind group assignment . There three time point assessment : intervention , end treatment ( T1 ) 3-months follow-up ( T2 ) . Patients recruit wait list Fibromyalgia day hospital program University Hospital Munich fulfil inclusion criterion . The intervention group treat 14 session EMG-biofeedback eight week addition usual care . The control group receive usual care . The main specific aim ass change fibromyalgia specific health status .
